title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.5 - Representation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.5 - Representation

State Regulations
A community board may designate its president, a member or
counsel to represent it in an appeal. Other parties may appear in person or be
represented by counsel. Only a person duly licensed and admitted to practice as
an attorney and counsellor-at-law in the courts of record of the State of New

York may appear as counsel in an appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
